title: Gas phase composition of a NiMH battery during a work cycle
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19996-20003
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02130D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aleksandra Lindberg, Björn Eriksson, Jenny Börjesson Axén, Amritha P. Sandra, Göran Lindbergh
In this study, two methods for investigating the internal NiMH battery gas phase composition during different charge/discharge cycles using a mass spectrometer (MS) were developed.
